org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.data.traintest

Class GenericTTDataSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.data.traintest.GenericTTDataSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TTDataSet, Specifiable

    public class GenericTTDataSet
extends java.lang.Object
implements TTDataSet

    A train-test data set backed by a pair of factories.

    Since:
    0.8

      • getIsolationGroup

        public java.util.UUID getIsolationGroup()
        Description copied from interface: TTDataSet

        Get the isolation group ID for this data set. Data sets in the same group will be allowed to run in parallel. This is used to implement data set isolation.

        Specified by:
        getIsolationGroup in interface TTDataSet
        Returns:
        The group ID for this data set.
